title.full: Command & Conquer Red Alert 3 Commanders Challenge

description.full: Fight for world domination in the all-new Red Alert 3 Commander’s Challenge!  Do you have what it takes to withstand the brutal onslaught and relentless taunting of the world’s toughest commanders, including Ric Flair as Commander Hill?  Find out as you attempt to conquer the world in 50 challenges featuring explosive new units such as the Giga Fortress, Desolator, and Cryo Legionnaire! This game requires the Xbox 360 hard drive for storage.
description.short: Build and control unbelievable armies in an alternate-reality world war between the Soviets, Allies, and Empire of the Rising Sun in Command & Conquer Red Alert 3: Commander's Challenge.
